name: Hypertension, Diagnostic Criteria
description:
- Normal blood pressure: systolic <120 mmHg and diastolic <80 mmHg
- Prehypertension: systolic 120 to 139 mmHg or diastolic 80 to 89 mmHg
- Hypertension:
- Stage 1: systolic 140 to 159 mmHg or diastolic 90 to 99 mmHg
- Stage 2: systolic ≥160 or diastolic ≥100 mmHg
- Stage 3: >180 systolic and >110 diastolic

name: Hypertension, Physical Examination Details
description:
GENERAL - thin or obese
VISION - (cover each eye)
NEURO
Gross exam (count fingers etc)
NECK
CARDIO - murmur - regular
LUNGS
ABDOMEN - renal bruits
EXTREMITIES - edema
SKIN
